ygData.subject: Re: Enchanters (OFF TOPIC)
ygData.msgSnippet: To andy smith who so uttered the reply that it would make it unbalanced to have an enchanter share illusions....I say that yer full of crock when it comes to
ygData.messageBody:
To andy smith who so uttered the reply that it would make it unbalanced to
have an enchanter share illusions....I say that yer full of crock when it
comes to the druid spell share wolf form sould be at least the one thing they
could duplicate to share since the shareing thing is in the system .As with
the others maybe werewolf should be too sice it dont really cover your
faction. I have seen a person in freeport bank with the illusion on and no
one bothering him.....However i would be very upset if once i obtained the
spirit wolf illusion on enchanter and find out that it has not the same
effect as share wolf form with the faction issue alone...In unrest the undead
did not touch me while i under shared wolf ....I hope the same is true for
the enchanter based spell. As for tinkering ....looks like on the backburner
till it gets easier ...Or i get alot richer......Sincerly Cloverleaf <Fennin
Ro>
